abstract.t: The Metro Ethernet Forum (MEF) has defined a rooted-multipoint Ethernet service known as Ethernet Tree (E-Tree). A solution framework for supporting this service in MPLS networks is proposed in and RFC called "A Framework for E-Tree Service over MPLS Network". This document discusses how those functional requirements can be easily met with (PBB-)EVPN and how (PBB-)EVPN offers a more efficient implementation of these functions.
